verbs.description: President Trump [V: has] vowed to go after " bad hombres " but his ICE agents are rounding up more undocumented immigrants without a criminal record .

President Trump has vowed to go after " bad hombres " but his ICE agents [V: are] rounding up more undocumented immigrants without a criminal record .
President Trump has vowed to go after " bad hombres " but [ARG0: his ICE agents] are [V: rounding] up [ARG1: more undocumented immigrants] [ARGM-MNR: without a criminal record] .
